author: ZGMFToddD
title: Nice minifig
review:
Came as an exclusive with Lego Super Heroes Justice Leauge Cosmic Clash!

Box/Instructions

Basic, like all poly-bags, nice background.

Parts

No new ones for me, nice printing on the body & head & especially the dics. The head is exactly the same as Ezra Bridger from Lego Star Wars Rebels (both sides!).

Minifigures

Cosmic Boy, the WHOLE set.

The build

Very simple, no instructions!

The completed model

Very nice, not disappointed @ all. 

Overall opinion

A very nice mini-figure, which is my 1st Lego DC figure. If you can get this online or in store packaged with the movie i recommend getting this, even if the movie doesn't interest you.

author: Odeinoichus
title: Join the Legion of Super Heroes
review:
Set #30604 Cosmic Boy: This is how you make awesome giveaways, Cosmic Boy is a very in-demand character for DC Fans and unlike Lightning Lad he's not relegated to a Target only LEGO Cube, making that figure harder to get than this one. Hopefully Saturn Girl will show up eventually.

Cosmic Boy is a really impressive Minifigure, he's got a double-sided torso with a great print, loaded with detail for his suit, the colours almost remind me of a Punisher outfit, without the skull logo mind you. His belt is a nice looking detail also with the L symbol for the Legion on his buckle. His legs are plain white with black printing, this was made before dual-molding became more common place I suspect. He's using Zod's hairpiece from the MOS sets and his facial expressions are a regular smile and a concerned, there's trouble we have to deal with, look.

For accessories you get two small radar dishes to attach to his hands to represent his power and a larger dish for him to stand on that shows him levitating with his magnetic powers. All three of which feature printing cosmic looking details in a spiral pattern.

He's a very nice looking figure and included with a very impressive film, as my review of the film covered. I'd recommend getting him for fans of DC Super Heroes, especially the Legion of Super Heroes.
